name: METAL SPACE
description:
Hi guys !

METAL SPACE is a space shooter inspirated by both Metal Slug and Space Invaders !

Grab some cool spaceship, kick some space asses.. you're not even close to beat the BOSS.

Made by two friends in 72 hours, we hope you'll enjoy it :)

Thanks for playing and feedback !

--- CREDITS ---

Guillaume DUFOUR
